channel.title: Trading Problem (525)
channel.description:
Well I have a problem with the trading options When anyone trades someone they cannot "Offer all" they can only give one of something
- Players cannot Offer 5, 10, or "all", they can only offer One,- [b]Can Anyone Help ME!?!?[/b]

item.title: Trading Problem (525)

item.description:
@oO_S-n-1-P-3-r_Oo wrote:

Well I have a problem with the trading options
When anyone trades someone they cannot “Offer all” they can only give one of something

  • Players cannot Offer 5, 10, or “all”, they can only offer One,-
    Can Anyone Help ME!?!?
